abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.description: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chamber are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: This unit can use Shoot and/or Charge abilities even if it used a Run or Retreat ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Astral Compass
abilities.description: The Vanguard-Hunters use their astral compass to track their enemies across the Mortal Realms.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target has the Hunted keyword for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Star-marked
abilities.description: Those tracked by the Vanguard-Hunters can be sensed from great distances.
abilities.effect: Add 2" to this unit's Move characteristic while a Hunted enemy unit is on the battlefield. In addition, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit's attacks that target a Hunted enemy unit.
